numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In every represented sport, there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
3. In men's basketball, the rate of racial disparity is 83%.
4. In women's basketball, the rate of racial disparity is 83%.
5. Men's basketball and women's basketball have the highest rate of racial disparity among the represented sports.
6. Major League Soccer has 41% head coaches of color.
7. Major League Soccer has the highest rate of head coaches of color among the represented sports.
8. The National Football League has 13% head coaches of color.
9. I wonder what the graphs looked like in previous years.
10. I want to compare the graphs from previous years with the graphs from the current year.
11. I wonder how the authors chose the sports for the graphs.
12. I live in a predominantly white community.
13. Most people in New Hampshire are white.
14. Because of this, I do not see racism first hand in my community.
15. However, I am aware of racism.
16. The headline is: Racism on the Fields.
